about_me: Senior Software Engineer, specialised in React. My perseverance and analytical thinking make me a skilled debugger. I architect highly reusable solutions with minimal code and minimal rework. Strong believer in open-source. AI agentic era enthusiast!

Refactored a mid-size app codebase and adopted TypeScript for improved quality and maintenance.

Refactored and reduced codebase by 15%, increasing application performance.
